Articles.Content:
Ok, having issues with getting the Zarya module into orbit in RSS for the ISS building. In the meantime, while I look for help in this, do you want me to document an entire building of the Russian space station, Mir in the stock game via pictures?

Mods to be used (primarily):

OLDD Proton

Bobcat Ind. Mir pack

Component Space Shuttle

Raidernick Soyuz & Salyut pack

Raidernick Russian Probes pack (for the Soyuz rocket)

Mechjeb 2

KAS

Laztech

EVE

Also, I need your opinion on if I should add clouds to the game and from which mod I should take them from!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-10T01:19:12Z" title="03/10/2015 01:19  AM" data-short="9 yr">March 10, 2015</time> by Sampa**
ok, thus far, it looks like the vote is unanimous! Very well, I'll do it!
Mods, could you please close this thread, I have a new idea to go alongside the building of Mir and to extend the series slightly

Mods, could I please have this closed? I have shifted all information to a different thread to better encompass what I want to do:

(see new thread here:[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/112821-Salyut-and-Mir](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/112821-Salyut-and-Mir))
Closed at user request. Better luck with your next attempt ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
